headline: Revvity Broadens Relationship with Genomics England to Advance Genomics in the UK
summary: WALTHAM, Mass., November 20, 2024--Revvity, Inc. (NYSE: RVTY), today announced an expansion of its work with Genomics England that leverages both organizations' expertise and resources to advance critical genomic initiatives across the United Kingdom. Building on the parties’ long and productive work history, this advanced collaboration is dedicated to accelerating Genomics England’s renowned research programs, supporting diverse areas in genomics, and fostering talent in innovative healthcare f
